intent_atoms.description: Store permanently blocked tasks in a dedicated directory to keep the day‑to‑day blocked list focused on recoverable issues.

Each archived task file must contain: 1) a descriptive title and date of retirement; 2) the reason it is permanently blocked; 3) prerequisite conditions that would allow work to resume; 4) links to historical context in DOCS/TASK_ARCHIVE or related specs.
Archived tasks must be moved from DOCS/INPROGRESS/blocked.md into this folder when they are deemed permanently blocked.
The day‑to‑day blocked list (DOCS/INPROGRESS/blocked.md) should only contain recoverable issues.
